front.title: IP Router Alert Considerations and Usage

abstract.t: The IP Router Alert Option is an IP option that alerts transit routers to more closely examine the contents of an IP packet. RSVP, PGM, IGMP/MLD and MRD are some of the protocols which make use of the IP Router Alert option. This document discusses security aspects and common practices around the use of the current IP Router Alert option and discusses consequences on the use of IP Router Alert by existing or new applications. Common practices in IP Router Alert implementation facilitating router protection are also discussed.
